To: enquiry@ha.org.hk
Subject: Request for Allocation of Additional Medical Staff to North District Hospital 

Dear Hong Kong Hospital Authority,

I hope this email finds you well. I am writing on behalf of North District Hospital to urgently request additional doctors and nurses allocated to North District Hospital due to the critical shortage of medical personnel and the rapid increase in patient numbers received by the North District Hospital.

The current shortage of medical staff and increase in the number of patients have put tremendous pressure on the hospital, jeopardizing patient care and potentially compromising patient safety. Therefore, we would like to have more medical staff members allocated to our hospital temporarily to ensure the provision of quality healthcare services to our community.

We understand the allocation of additional resources is challenging due to the general lack of medical staff in the public healthcare system of Hong Kong. However, we strongly emphasize the urgency of the situation and the potential risk associated with continued understaffing. The well-being and safety of our patients are of paramount importance, and we believe that immediate action is necessary to address this critical issue.

Thank you for your attention to this matter, we eagerly await your response and the allocation of more medical staff to our hospital.

Yours faithfully,
Kris Chou
Director
North District Hospital
